inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| summarize count() by AWSRegion, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| extend internalEvent = iff(isempty(VpcEndpointId), "External", "Internal")
| summarize count() by internalEvent, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| summarize NumberOfEvents = count() by UserIdentityAccountId
| where UserIdentityAccountId != ""

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName contains "securitygroup"
| summarize count() by EventName, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName in ("ApplySecurityGroupsToClientVpnTargetNetwork",
"AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress",
"AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress",
"CreateSecurityGroup",
"DeleteSecurityGroup",
"RevokeSecurityGroupEgress",
"RevokeSecurityGroupIngress",
"UpdateSecurityGroupRuleDescriptionsEgress",
"UpdateSecurityGroupRuleDescriptionsIngress")
| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion
| sort by TimeGenerated desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName contains "networkacl"
| summarize count() by EventName, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SessionMfaAuthenticated, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName contains "loadbalancer"
| summarize count() by EventName, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName == "AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress"
     or EventName == "AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress"
     or EventName == "RevokeSecurityGroupEgress"
     or EventName == "RevokeSecurityGroupIngress"
| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion
| sort by TimeGenerated desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName contains "gateway"
| summarize count() by EventName, TimeGenerated

content.Query:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName in ("AcceptTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"AssociateTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"AttachInternetGateway",
"AttachVpnGateway",
"CreateCustomerGateway",
"CreateEgressOnlyInternetGateway",
"CreateInternetGateway",
"CreateNatGateway",
"CreateTransitGateway",
"CreateTransitGatewayRoute",
"CreateTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"CreateTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"CreateVpnGateway",
"DeleteCustomerGateway",
"DeleteEgressOnlyInternetGateway",
"DeleteInternetGateway",
"DeleteNatGateway",
"DeleteTransitGateway",
"DeleteTransitGatewayRoute",
"DeleteTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"DeleteTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"DeleteVpnGateway",
"DetachInternetGateway",
"DetachVpnGateway",
"DisableTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagation",
"DisassociateTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"EnableTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagation",
"ExportTransitGatewayRoutes",
"GetTransitGatewayAttachmentPropagations",
"GetTransitGatewayRouteTableAssociations",
"GetTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagations",
"ModifyTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"RejectTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"ReplaceTransitGatewayRoute",
"SearchTransitGatewayRoutes")
| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion
| sort by TimeGenerated desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| take 100
| summarize count() by EventName, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName in ("AssociateRouteTable",
"AssociateTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"CreateClientVpnRoute",
"CreateRoute",
"CreateRouteTable",
"CreateTransitGatewayRoute",
"CreateTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"CreateVpnConnectionRoute",
"DeleteClientVpnRoute",
"DeleteRoute",
"DeleteRouteTable",
"DeleteTransitGatewayRoute",
"DeleteTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"DeleteVpnConnectionRoute",
"DisableTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagation",
"DisableVgwRoutePropagation",
"DisassociateRouteTable",
"DisassociateTransitGatewayRouteTable",
"EnableTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagation",
"EnableVgwRoutePropagation",
"ExportTransitGatewayRoutes",
"GetTransitGatewayRouteTableAssociations",
"GetTransitGatewayRouteTablePropagations",
"ReplaceRoute",
"ReplaceRouteTableAssociation",
"ReplaceTransitGatewayRoute",
"SearchTransitGatewayRoutes")
| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion
| sort by TimeGenerated desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| take 100
| summarize count() by EventName, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName in ("AcceptTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"AcceptVpcEndpointConnections",
"AcceptVpcPeeringConnection",
"AssociateVpcCidrBlock",
"AttachClassicLinkVpc",
"CreateDefaultVpc",
"CreateTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"CreateVpc",
"CreateVpcEndpoint",
"CreateVpcEndpointConnectionNotification",
"CreateVpcEndpointServiceConfiguration",
"CreateVpcPeeringConnection",
"DeleteTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"DeleteVpc",
"DeleteVpcEndpointConnectionNotifications",
"DeleteVpcEndpoints",
"DeleteVpcEndpointServiceConfigurations",
"DeleteVpcPeeringConnection",
"DetachClassicLinkVpc",
"DisableVpcClassicLink",
"DisableVpcClassicLinkDnsSupport",
"DisassociateVpcCidrBlock",
"EnableVpcClassicLink",
"EnableVpcClassicLinkDnsSupport",
"ModifyTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"ModifyVpcAttribute",
"ModifyVpcEndpoint",
"ModifyVpcEndpointConnectionNotification",
"ModifyVpcEndpointServiceConfiguration",
"ModifyVpcEndpointServicePermissions",
"ModifyVpcPeeringConnectionOptions",
"ModifyVpcTenancy",
"MoveAddressToVpc",
"RejectTransitGatewayVpcAttachment",
"RejectVpcEndpointConnections",
"RejectVpcPeeringConnection")
| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion
| sort by TimeGenerated desc nulls last

inputs.value:
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName contains "subnet"

inputs.value:

| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion
| sort by TimeGenerated desc nulls last

| where EventName contains "network"

| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion

| take 100

| project TimeGenerated, EventName, UserIdentityAccountId, UserIdentityPrincipalid, UserAgent, UserIdentityUserName, SourceIpAddress, AWSRegion

| where EventName contains "dns" or EventName contains "domainname"
